user_action: type "meticulous" into the search bar with the placeholder text 'Search English' to find its pronunciation and IPA notation.
observation: The US English pronunciation for "meticulous" is noted as /məˈtɪk.jə.ləs/ in IPA notation. An example sentence provided is: "Many hours of meticulous preparation have gone into writing the book." Progress has been made towards finding the pronunciation and example sentence.
